bibl.title: The Bilingual Family Archive of Dryton, His Wife Apollonia and Their Daughter Senmouthis (P. Dryton). With a contribution on the 'Alexandrian Erotic Fragment' or 'Maedchens Klage' by Peter BING. (Collectanea Hellenistica. IV.)

publisher.orgName: Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie van België voor Wetenschappen en Kunsten. Comité Klassieke Studies. Subcomité Hellenisme

bibl.note: P. Dryton 1-58. - Ph.D. K.U.Leuven, 1992. The present volume contains the text edition proper. The reconstruction of the archive and of other archives from the same town of Pathyris will be discussed in a second volume, which also contains an elaborate introduction to the family of Dryton, Apollonia and Senmouthis. - [Introduction.] - I. Wills, Marriage and Divorce (1-9). - II. Loans and Receipts (10-30). - III. Petitions (31-34). - IV. Letters (35-36). - V. Lists and Accounts (37-45). - VI. Varia (46-50) [including: The 'Alexandrian Erotic Fragment' or 'Maedchens Klage' (by Peter BING), P. Grenf. I, 1 = P. lit. Lond. 50 (= Pack2 1743) (50)]. - VII. Ostraka (51-58). - VIII. Appendices: A. Greek cheirographon of the Peteharsemtheus archive written by Dryton; - B. Greek Graffiti by Dryton [Valley of the Kings]; - C. Demotic temple oath for Esthladas. - Excursus. The handwriting of Dryton and his son Esthladas. - Bibliographical abbreviations. Concordances. Indices.
